summary:
Okay, so basically, we just started a little chat! You said “yes” and we explored how that simple affirmation can be a really positive starting point. 

It seems like we're just bouncing ideas around and seeing where things go – you were open to exploring possibilities. It’s cool you were willing to just say yes and see what happens! 

Right now, it’s just about keeping that momentum going – what’s next you’re thinking about?
